REPORT.name: Прибыль по компьютерам
REPORT.description: Распределение прибыли по компьютерам --- Author: GameClass Software support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code: select computers.number as [Компьютер], repDetails.ipaddress as [ip-Адрес], sum(repDetails.summa) as [Сумма] from repDetails inner join computers on (computers.[ipaddress] = repDetails.[ipaddress]) where ([moment] >= %TIME-START%) and ([moment]<=%TIME-STOP%) group by computers.number,repDetails.ipaddress order by [Сумма] desc
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
